MechWorkModeDef.label: work
MechWorkModeDef.description: Work autonomously according to mechanoid type. Automatically go to rechargers and recharge when needed.

MechWorkModeDef.label: escort
MechWorkModeDef.description: Stay near the mechanitor and fight nearby enemies. Follow the mechanitor, even off the map.

MechWorkModeDef.label: recharge
MechWorkModeDef.description: Go to rechargers and recharge, even if already well-charged.

MechWorkModeDef.label: dormant self-charge
MechWorkModeDef.description: Go into a dormant self-charging state that very slowly regains energy without a recharger.
